job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Translate business requirements and engineering plans into detailed technical specifications.
     * Conduct thorough technical reviews to ensure alignment with established engineering and architectural guidelines.
     * Oversee the integration of various system components to ensure seamless functionality.
     * Play a key role in leading technical teams to successfully execute architectural plans.
     * Manage extensive stakeholder relationships with clients, ensuring clear communication and alignment on project goals.
     * Mentor and guide junior team members, fostering their growth and development.
     * Contribute to the quality and security of architectural implementations, ensuring adherence to best practices.
     * Provide expert input and technical insights for requests
job_details.full_text:
Senior Data Engineer (Advanced Analytics)

* Translate business requirements and engineering plans into detailed technical specifications.
     * Conduct thorough technical reviews to ensure alignment with established engineering and architectural guidelines.
     * Oversee the integration of various system components to ensure seamless functionality.
     * Play a key role in leading technical teams to successfully execute architectural plans.
     * Manage extensive stakeholder relationships with clients, ensuring clear communication and alignment on project goals.
     * Mentor and guide junior team members, fostering their growth and development.
     * Contribute to the quality and security of architectural implementations, ensuring adherence to best practices.
     * Provide expert input and technical insights for requests

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering, architectural oversight, and team leadership rather than specific AI/ML model development or deployment. While it mentions 'Advanced Analytics', the core responsibilities do not align with the specialized tasks of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Translate business requirements and engineering plans into detailed technical specifications.
Manage extensive stakeholder relationships with clients, ensuring clear communication and alignment on project goals.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand business needs and translate them into technical plans, as well as manage client relationships and project goals.

phrases: Conduct thorough technical reviews to ensure alignment with established engineering and architectural guidelines.
Oversee the integration of various system components to ensure seamless functionality.
Contribute to the quality and security of architectural implementations, ensuring adherence to best practices.
job_tasks.justification: These tasks involve reviewing, integrating, and ensuring the quality and security of software and architectural implementations, which are core to software development.

phrases: Play a key role in leading technical teams to successfully execute architectural plans.
Mentor and guide junior team members, fostering their growth and development.
Provide expert input and technical insights for requests
job_tasks.justification: Leading teams, mentoring, and providing expert input demonstrate initiative, ownership, and leadership qualities.

phrases: Translate business requirements and engineering plans into detailed technical specifications.
Manage extensive stakeholder relationships with clients, ensuring clear communication and alignment on project goals.
Mentor and guide junior team members, fostering their growth and development.
soft_skills.justification: These phrases highlight the need for clear communication with stakeholders, clients, and junior team members, as well as collaboration in translating requirements.

phrases: Conduct thorough technical reviews to ensure alignment with established engineering and architectural guidelines.
Oversee the integration of various system components to ensure seamless functionality.
Provide expert input and technical insights for requests
soft_skills.justification: These tasks require analyzing technical aspects, ensuring functionality, and providing expert solutions to problems or requests.

phrases: Play a key role in leading technical teams to successfully execute architectural plans.
Mentor and guide junior team members, fostering their growth and development.
Contribute to the quality and security of architectural implementations, ensuring adherence to best practices.
soft_skills.justification: Leading teams, mentoring, and taking responsibility for architectural quality and best practices indicate ownership and a proactive approach.
